growth_curves.description: Trajectories defining statistical progression and experience requirements

values.name: Steady
values.description: Linear, consistent stat gain and experience thresholds across all levels

values.name: Strong Starter
values.description: High initial base stats with minimal gain per level

values.name: Quick Learner
values.description: Lower experience thresholds required to reach subsequent levels

values.name: Late Bloomer
values.description: Low initial stats with significant multiplier spikes at high levels (7-10)

values.name: Slow
values.description: Higher experience thresholds requiring more accumulation per level

values.name: Key Levels
values.description: Moderate growth with specific large stat jumps at pre-defined milestones (e.g., Lvl 5, Lvl 10)
